nodes.text: The Huloons were a sentient species whose anatomy included hands. During the reign of the Galactic Empire a Huloon youngling lived as a beggar on the Five Points space station. While crouched in supplication in a park on board the station, the Huloon was given a handful of credits by the criminal Jyn Erso after she stole them.

In the new Star Wars canon, Huloons first appeared in the 2017 novel Rebel Rising and its audiobook adaptation, which were written by Beth Revis. The species originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they were first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
